plot: Two old friends from back on the block have taken different paths and now find themselves at odds. Both facing death in their own way and each with the key to the others survival.
title: La Amistad
plot_es: Two old friends from back on the block have taken different paths and now find themselves at odds. Both facing death in their own way and each with the key to the others survival.
plot_en: Two old friends from back on the block have taken different paths and now find themselves at odds. Both facing death in their own way and each with the key to the others survival.
